long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Configurable bookmarking for teams and individuals. Features include improved bookmark grouping (team, tags), multiple ways to save bookmarks, configurable color schemes. Improved editing / updating and other actions.
